text:
A Moment of Panic

Sick man in bed, anxious and restless.  
Thoughts racing, heart pounding.  
Sick man: “Do they know of it yet?”  

Sick man: “What if they’re mocking me?”  

---

Nastasya eavesdropping, intrigued by Razumihin.  
She whispers to herself, grinning.  
Nastasya: “Ah, he’s a deep one!”  

Nastasya: “What will he say to Pashenka?”  

---

Sick man leaps from bed, frantic.  
Sweat drips, eyes wild.  
Sick man: “What am I to do now?”  

Sick man: “It’s all forgotten, as if on purpose!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The sick man is consumed by anxiety and impatience, fearing that his secret has been discovered while he is incapacitated.
